item.title: Rosamund Pike Commands the Stage in ‘Inter Alia’ First Look Images (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: London’s National Theatre has unveiled first-look production images of Rosamund Pike and the cast in Suzie Miller’s “Inter Alia,” offering a glimpse of the Golden Globe winner
